settings.title: DataAndBI
settings.tagline: Blog related to the world of data and Business Intelligence revolving around it.
settings.author: Navneet Sharma

pages.title: About Me
pages.body:
I am Senior Technical Lead for Business Intelligence. I am passionate about data and related technologies and how you can use it to gain invaluable insights. You can find me on Linked In.

My Belief:

Knowledge is having the right answer. Intelligence is asking the right question.!

Various technologies which I focus on

  • SQL Server Integration Services
  • SQL Server Reporting Services
  • T-SQL Scripting
  • Dot Net Application Development
  • Cognos ICM

What I have been doing

I have been working with great companies like Infosys (2.7 yrs), Thomson Reuters (4 yrs), Tata Consultancy Services (<1 yrs) & Polaris Consulting Services (present).

I have been busy building enterprise solutions around:

  • Azure Billing & Chargeback
  • Enterprise Datacenter Management solutions
  • System Center customization solutions
  • Windows Azure Pack customizations and resource providers

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to contact me on social media or on my email id at nkhurmi@gmail.com.

Thanks for reading!

posts.author: Navneet Sharma
posts.title: Introducing Data And BI
posts.body:
Data And BI is a blog about the world of Data and Business Intelligence that revolves around it. I will try to cover various aspects of the SQL Server and Business Intelligence tools and technologies.

I invite to take this journey with me! Keep learning!
